review: Setup was exceptionally simple and I am able to watch all of my streaming services (Netflix, HBO GO, Hulu Plus, YouTube, etc.) in lovely hd instantly (I use my Nexus 7 tablet and Galaxy S4, but my roommates are also able to use their iPhones and iPads).  If this is what you are purchasing this product for, you will not be disappointed.  I also take advantage of streaming Google Music through the tv when friends are over.  It's a fantastic device at a fantastic price and I am absolutely thrilled with it.
